statements: SELECT * FROM file_comments WHERE comment_id = 1;
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM file_comments WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT comment_id, file_id, user_id FROM file_comments WHERE file_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM file_comments WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT file_id, user_id FROM file_comments WHERE user_id = 4 ORDER BY file_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM file_comments ORDER BY comment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT comment_id, user_id, comment_text FROM file_comments WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY comment_date ASC;
SELECT comment_id, user_id, comment_text, comment_date FROM file_comments WHERE file_id = 10 AND user_id = 20;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_comments FROM file_comments WHERE comment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(comment_id) as total_comments FROM file_comments GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(comment_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM files WHERE file_type = 'document';
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM files ORDER BY file_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT review_id, rating, comment FROM reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01' AND review_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM files WHERE file_id = 1;
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM files WHERE file_size >= 1000 ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM files JOIN reviews ON files.file_id = reviews.file_id WHERE reviews.rating > 3 ORDER BY reviews.review_date ASC;
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_type FROM files WHERE file_type LIKE 'image%' AND file_size < 5000;
SELECT review_id, rating, comment, review_date FROM reviews WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM comments ORDER BY comment_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT comment_id, user_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE file_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ratings WHERE rating_value > 3 ORDER BY rating_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, review_text FROM reviews WHERE file_id = 5 AND user_id = 10;
SELECT comment_text FROM comments WHERE user_id = 7;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT comment_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE file_id = 5;
SELECT COUNT(comment_id) AS total_comments, AVG(rating_value) AS avg_rating FROM comments c JOIN ratings r ON c.file_id = r.file_id;
SELECT review_text FROM reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01' AND review_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, rating_value FROM ratings WHERE file_id IN (SELECT file_id FROM comments WHERE user_id = 2);
SELECT * FROM comments ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT comment_text, user_id FROM comments WHERE file_id = 5;
SELECT file_name, file_type, file_size FROM files WHERE file_type = 'image' LIMIT 10;
SELECT review_text, rating_value FROM reviews WHERE user_id = 10 AND rating_value > 3;
SELECT * FROM ratings WHERE rating_value < 2 AND file_id IN (SELECT file_id FROM files WHERE file_type = 'document');
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT comment_id, comment_text, created_at FROM comments WHERE comment_id > 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_type FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY file_name ASC;
SELECT review_text, rating_value FROM reviews WHERE rating_value >= 4 AND file_id = 10;
SELECT file_name, uploaded_at FROM files WHERE file_type = 'pdf' AND uploaded_by = 3 ORDER BY uploaded_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM files
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM files
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_type FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_size FROM files ORDER BY file_size DESC
SELECT * FROM reviews JOIN users ON reviews.user_id = users.user_id
SELECT * FROM files WHERE file_type = 'image' ORDER BY file_size DESC
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000
SELECT user_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE LENGTH(comment_text) > 50 GROUP BY user_id
SELECT u.username, r.rating_value FROM users u JOIN ratings r ON u.user_id = r.user_id
SELECT r.review_text, r.rating_value, u.email FROM reviews r JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY r.reviewed_at DESC
